LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St, Brooklyn</b>Weekend & <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/service/servNotices_PresidentsDay_2018.htm target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Holiday</font></a>, 9:45 PM Fri to 11:45 PM Mon, Feb 16 - 19<br><br>Trains stop at 36 St.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av and 25 St, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a <br>Manhattan-bound [D]* [N]* or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [D] [N] or [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer <br>to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 45 St and 53 St, take the [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [N] or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br><i>*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.<br></i><b><br>

Summary._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  [R] Trains skip 5 Av/59 St, Lexington Av/59 St and Queens Plaza in both directions

Description._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  [R] Trains skip 5 Av/59 St, Lexington Av/59 St and Queens Plaza in both directions

LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[R] Trains skip 5 Av/59 St, Lexington Av/59 St and Queens Plaza in both directions</b><a href=http://advisory.mtanyct.info/pdf_files/ServiceGuide.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Weekend</font></a> & <a href=http://web.mta.info/nyct/service/servNotices_PresidentsDay_2018.htm target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Holiday</font></a>, Sat to Mon, Feb 17 - 19<br><br>Trains are rerouted via the <b>[F] </b>in both directions between 57 St-7 Av, Manhattan and 36 St, Queens,<br>making stops at the Lexington Av/63 St, Roosevelt Island and 21 St-Queensbridge [F] Stations.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  width=80%><tr><td><font size=3><b>Travel Alternatives</b><td align=right>[TP]</table><br>For <b>5 Av/59 St</b> and <b>Lexington Av/59 St</b>, use nearby 5 Av/53 St <b>[E]</b>, Lexington Av/53 St <b>[E]<br></b>or 59 St <b>[4] [5] [6]</b> stations.<br><br>For <b>Queens Plaza</b>, take the <b>[E]</b> instead.<br><br> Transfer between <b>[R] </b>and <b>[4] [5] [6] </b>trains at 14 St-Union Sq.<br> </font>Transfer between <b>[R] </b>and <b>[E] </b>trains at Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority or Roosevelt Av.<br> </font>Transfer between <b>[E] </b>and <b>[4] [5] [6] </b>trains at 51 St-Lexington Av/53 St.<br><br><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td>  [ad]  <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  </font></table><br><b><br>
